title: Araliya Terrace Nugegoda
details:
Araliya Terrace off Pagoda Road, Nugegoda is a private and exclusive residential development with only 09 units in total. Located in a quiet, highly residential private road, it is in close proximity to Kotte, Nawala, Rajagiriya and Colombo. With over 75% of the building complete, hand-over of the project is intended for December 2018 and viewing of the units currently undergoing finishing work can be arranged.

All units are Spacious 03 Bedroom Apartments with large Living and Dining Areas, Pantry and separate Domestic Quarters spanning over 1600 Sq. Ft. each. All the units come fully Air-Conditioned, with a Fully Fitted Contemporary Pantry, Elegant Bath-Ware, Modern LED Lighting etc. Each unit is also allocated one dedicated parking slot.

Highlights

Exclusive Residential Development with only 09 Units in Total
Very Spacious Apartments
Large Rooms with En Suite Master Bedroom and Balcony
Fully Air-Conditioned Apartment
Designer Pantry | Bath ware | Tiling etc.
Elegant LED Lighting
Private Garden for Two Units on the First Floor
75% Completed and ready for viewing with Prior Appointment

Common Facilities

Scenic Rooftop Lounge for Events
Fully Equipped Gym
Dedicated Parking
24 Hour Security and CCTV System
Back-Up Power Via Generator
Reception / Waiting Area
